events.message: I received my order last week but would like to request a refund since the item does not meet my expectations.
The case has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's mention of refund and dissatisfaction.
Support agent Karen has been assigned to handle this refund case and will respond shortly.
Hello, I’m Karen from support. I understand you want a refund and I’m here to assist you with the process.
Could you please provide your order number and explain why the item did not meet your expectations?
My order number is 7634821. The product looks significantly different from the description and I’m very disappointed.
Thank you for the details. We can start a refund process immediately and provide a prepaid label for the return shipment.
That sounds good to me. I appreciate the quick response and will send the item back as soon as I get the label.
Your refund has been processed successfully after we received the returned item. Please check your bank account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Thank you for contacting us. We are closing this case now. Please do not hesitate to reach out for future support.
You will shortly receive a survey invitation to rate your satisfaction with our refund handling and support.
